item.description:
Presentation: 30 minutes.
Project management continues to change, with the emergence of better collaboration tools and changes in the industry and business practice. In this Meetup, Chris will lead off an open discussion on some key PM practices as they relate to the specifics of web design and production. We'll review the classic stages of the web project: discovery / definition / design and prototyping / build and QA / launch. We'll do a brief review of some popular collaborative software solutions, Basecamp, Pivotaltracker and a few others. We'll also discuss the value and role of various kinds of project documentation: technical/functional specification documents, page description diagrams, wireframes, and Gantt charts.

Discussion: 30-60 minutes.
We'll open the discussion for the group to exchange ideas and experiences on PM practice.

Beverages and snacks will be served!

A $5 contribution is requested to cover the Meetup expenses.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Presentation: Project Management for the Web
